text: Hi, I was wondering if I could get some help with room service, please?
I recently heard about a new restaurant in the city, have you been there before?

I want to close my account and cancel any pending subscriptions.
I am sure I need to speak to a human, please transfer me.
I want to book a reservation for two at a fancy restaurant for this Friday and also check the movie timings for the new Avengers movie.
I can't express how grateful I am for your assistance. Not just for this issue, but for all the times you've come to my aid.
How do I activate my new loyalty program membership for the steakhouse chain?
The water fountain in the gym is not working, can you please have someone fix it?
Can you recommend any good Italian restaurants nearby? Also, do you know what time the movie theater closes tonight?
